document.full_text: teenage prodigy matteo manassero, who has already won twice on the european tour, says he owes a great deal to fellow italians francesco and edoardo molinari for the help they have given him in his short career.
document.title: i owe molinaris a lot, says twice tour winner manassero
lines_and_colors: teenage prodigy matteo manassero, who has already won twice on the european tour, says he owes a great deal to fellow italians francesco and edoardo molinari for the help they have given him in his short career.
